precondition: The status bar at the bottom of the Corel WordPerfect 7 window displays "Pos 1" indicating the cursor is at the beginning of the line.
expected_results: The cursor will move to the end of the current line and change to a right-pointing arrow.

precondition: The Corel WordPerfect 7 document window is active.
expected_results: The 'Open File' dialog box will appear.
